title: West of Dead: A Nathaniel Caine Adventure
description: Fans of Joe R. Lansdale, Robert Davis, and Adam Millard will love this fast paced tale of the Weird West.What good is a six-shooter against a horde of the undead?Nathaniel Caine wants to forget the War and see the frontier, and a trip by stagecoach seems like the perfect way. When the stage pulls into a deserted way station with obvious signs of violence, but a disturbing lack of bodies, he suspects things are going bad. Things go from bad to worse when the passengers fall under attack by people that should be dead, and Caine must call on old skills just to survive. He'll also need the help of a fellow passenger who knows more than he's telling if the restless dead are to be put back in the ground.
author: Eric Bahle
